name: A Researcher and her Rat
description:
Made for the GMTK 2021.

An accident when experimenting has caused your mind to be split between you and a rat. You will have to control both to make it to the device the will fix your brain.

Source code: https://github.com/Zoey-21/A-Researcher-And-Her-Rat

Music By https://opengameart.org/users/pro-sensory
